content: [EDIT]9/25/22Volare Network's ROUND 3 Bounty campaign has officially ended.Bounty rewards will be distributed by the official escrow once the final list have been created.[EDIT]11/5/22Bounty rewards distribution is complete. See the transaction IDs on the main spreadsheet [ HERE ].....XX.{ WEBSITE }   { TELEGRAM }   { TWITTER }   { MEDIUM }   { WALLET }   { REDDIT }   { ANN THREAD }....XXDisclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. Join (on this bounty campaign)or Invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO) at your own risk.
